comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

issue.title: www.yogajournal.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.yogajournal.com](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.yogajournal.com) ### Comment Username: @arturstat > Website does not open with dpi enabled. Adding @@||yogajournal.com^$stealth=dpi to the user rules fixes the issue. ### Screenshots

issue.title: www.nikkei.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://www.nikkei.com](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.nikkei.com) ### Comment > nikkei.comは日本の全国紙である日本経済新聞の電子版です（オンラインの有料会員数は日本の新聞社で最も多い）。ADGUARDを適用しても、広告（おそらくnikkei.comが独自に配信しているもの）が表示されます。「手動で要素をブロック」で広告を消しても、すぐに広告が復活します。また、Cookieの同意通知も表示されます。可能であればご対応お願いします。 > ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adtidy.org/sitereports/onasy0ookis40ko0gsooc80ck0oo84whni3n8ulhio.png?nc=1)
Screenshot 2 ![Screenshot 2](https://cdn.adtidy.org/sitereports/th2s6kxnbs0kwog0k80os4kgoccgc84beg2udzeopc.png?nc=1)
Screenshot 3 ![Screenshot 3](https://cdn.adtidy.org/sitereports/szk45zqofesk888cs44oc0okwow04k067s9p39l8pk.png?nc=1)

Screenshot 5 ![Screenshot 5](https://cdn.adtidy.org/sitereports/2c3js5k2pjvoosk48888s88kg0go0swla56krlhdk0.png?nc=1)
Screenshot 6 ![Screenshot 6](https://cdn.adtidy.org/sitereports/8lahdxfw5a0ww0ccgssg4soc4owwkk4bpjluev0pmo.png?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard for Safari v1.11.13 Browser: | Safari Filters: | Ad Blocking:
